_aLatestUpdates._sText: I made a map render for this one. :) Hope you like it.

_sText:
DE_COLDHAZE: The place where you freeze and die! 

STORYLINE (I made this one up!): Terrorism still goes on and then, the Arctic Terrorists, with the help of the 3 Terrorists group, went to a village located at the northern part of Canada to salvage things and destroy. They're planning to plant a bomb near the pension house and at a house near the hiking grounds in order to start an avalanche. 

TERRORISTS: Plant the bomb to start the avalanche or eliminate any hostile in the area. 
COUNTER-TERRORISTS: Eliminate the terrorists and stop them from planting the bomb. 

GET YOUR JACKETS BECAUSE THE REAL FROSTBITE STARTS NOW! 

17Buddies.net 

============= 

NOTE: If there are errors in this map, I can't fix them.
